dialogue: Tequia's platoon land at the Empire base on Planet Molotov.
They follow the same plan as before, Tequia assigns captains to
squads and has them go out to the battlefield
while she stays back with a few soldiers and Spirit.
Their forces join with the soldiers that called for backup,
and they manage to push the Militia back with ease.
It all seemed to be going perfectly
Then the anomaly appeared again. Some unknown power came
and wiped out a sizeable portion of all combatants
Empire and Militia alike.
What the hell was that?!
We don't know miss!
Dammit, what the hell...
Again it struck, destroying more. Then again and again,
until there were no more Empire soldiers left.
Dammit! All our soldiers are dead!
Um captain. There are signs of the anomaly...approaching us!
Oh no!
Calm down, dammit! ...Okay, Spirit get on your ship and go bac-
Suddenly the roof of the base pried apart
and the source of their troubles bore its head.
Mrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrnnnnnnnnnn.
A creature stared down at them. Its eyes bore holes
in their skulls until it finally made a move.
Mrrnnnnnnnppppp!
Aaaah!
The soldiers and Tequia found themselves lifted into the air.
Then they were crushed. Their bones churned against each other.
Blood splatterd out of their bodies. Spirit could only watch.
Once it was done with them, the creature turned its eyes to Spirit.
She was lifted into the air by some force.
She felt a sudden pressure on her from all sides,
in a very painful moment, before it all disappeared.
